item.title: The cast of Blitz Bazawule’s ‘THE COLOR PURPLE’ starring Fantasia Barrino, Phylicia Pearl Mpasi, Taraji P. Henson, Colman Domingo, Halle Bailey, Danielle Brooks, H.E.R. and Corey Hawkins.

item.title:
Renate Reinsve to star in Zach Cregger’s ‘WEAPONS’ opposite Pedro Pascal.
The film is described as a multistory horror epic that tonally is in the vein of Magnolia, the 1999 actor-crammed showcase from filmmaker Paul Thomas Anderson.
item.author: FilmUpdates
